entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 07:31 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 07:31 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
